dct_alternative_sm: Carte du Congo Belge Administrative, Commerciale, Routière et Hydrographique : comprenant toutes les routes, chemins de fer les rivières, cours d'eau, les comptoirs commerciaux et les missions
dct_description_sm: One of the earliest printed maps of the Belgian Congo, published in Brussels, Belgium, shortly after the establishment of the Belgian Congo as a colony of Belgium. The map identifies the various districts and regions of the Belgian Congo.
Publie̓e par Lebègue & Cie. ; imp. J.-E. Goossens, Bruxelles - Lille - Paris.
Shows various cities and settlements, churches, waterways, marshland, forests, various boundaries, railroads (including projected and underconstruction), telegraph lines.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
